attributes.action: Apply zero rate VAT and extend 0% Carbon Trust Loans (currently only business) to Farms and Homes
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
'We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to remove VAT on all forms of renewable energy products.
The petition also requests that Carbon Trust (funded by HMRC) extends the current 0% loans to energy conservation for agriculture and private dwellings.

This is for products including but not limited to solar thermal, solar PV, bio-mass, low energy light bulbs, all forms of insulation, 'A' rated double glazing sealed units,wind turbines, ground source heat-pumps,installed and supply only'

Our objective is in making renewable energy fit the pocket of almost every citizen in our battle to beat climate change
